description.name: LEI Codes
description.tagline: Automate the provisioning of LEI codes in your WHMCS with GoGETSSL.
description.short: Automate the provisioning of LEI codes in your WHMCS with GoGETSSL.
description.long: Legal Entity Identifier (LEI) is a unique global identifier for legal entities participating in financial transactions. This module allow to manage LEI codes products via WHMCS. Clients are able to make order transactions and check all important details.
